beam_tof.def: Cuts to the beam particle ToF [ns] to select pions.

beam_endz.def: Cut beam EndZ [cm]. Helps remove beam muons.

pida.def: Avg PIDA score cut, used for PID

cnn_trackshower.def: Cut CNN track/shower score. Classify daughters as track or shower

deltaR.def: Cut (lower limit) to daughter tracks distance to vertex to help reject non-pi0 daughters

daughter_nhits.def: Daughter nhits lower limit to help reject non-pi0 gammas

michel_score.def: Michel score to help reject beam muons (Ajib's CNN method)
